attributes.action: Punish Middle and Outside Lane Drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the goverment continuing to spend money on improvements to the highways and congestion on the rise it seems ridiculous that we allow people to use the highways in an inefficient manner. By highlighting and punishing that people must pull into an empty lane regardless of their speed (though slow driving and lorries especially) we would see a dramatic improvement in the utilisation of our roads and a reduction in rage felt by thousands of drivers every day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
